name: Fidget Hand Spinner 2D Twister
description:
Fidget Spinner
You dream of buying a real spinner from a bearing, but there's no money..

Why spend, when you can completely set yourself a hand

spinner on your phone and twist as much as you want.

Hand spinner - a new type of anti-stress toy.

Fidget spinner - will raise the mood, increase concentration,

charge positive emotions and relieve fatigue.

The game perfectly worked out the physics of rotation.

Spin in school, on the street, at home, everywhere and have fun.

Features:
- Simple Game
- Fun Game
- Addictive Game
